item.title: Dominion and former Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani settle defamation lawsuit
item.description: Lawyers for Dominion Voting Systems and Giuliani said both parties agreed to a “confidential settlement.” Terms were not disclosed.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel is coming back to Nexstar and Sinclair’s ABC stations
item.description: “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” has been off the air on ABC stations in D.C. and other markets since Disney-owned ABC reinstated the late-night host Tuesday.

item.title: Supreme Court allows Trump officials to freeze billions in foreign aid
item.description: The Supreme Court allowed the Trump administration to freeze more than $4 billion in foreign aid.

item.title: House Democrats release new records from Epstein estate
item.description: Democrats on the House Oversight Committee released redacted calendars, financial documents and flight logs from the estate.

item.title: Congress is barreling toward a shutdown, despite the perils
item.description: Democrats say they won’t back a GOP bill to extend government funding and prevent a shutdown unless Republicans negotiate with them over health care.
